meanings.sent1: The old mattress was the saggiest one in the whole store.
meanings.sent2: Her baggy pants were the saggiest in the group.
meanings.sent3: The saggiest balloon in the bunch slowly floated to the ground.
meanings.sent4: The ship's sails hung like the saggiest cloth in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The dog's ears were the saggiest I had ever seen, almost touching the ground.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the pillows, hers was the saggiest.
meanings.sent2: The older dog was saggiest among the three.
meanings.sent3: The saggiest branch on the tree looked like it might break soon.
meanings.sent4: The saggiest part of the hammock was where he always sat.
meanings.sent5: The saggiest part of the cake was the middle, where it had sunk in.
